name: PearAI
long_description:
PearAI is an open source AI code editor. Think a better GitHub Copilot, or an open source Cursor. We're a fork of VSCode to maintain it's familiarity and functionalities, and add upon it the most seamless AI integration with all the top of the market models.

People who have been using it so far expressed that PearAI has up to 5x’d their work and development speed by having AI integrated features such as the ability to talk to your codebase directly. Students also said this accelerated their learning tremendously, with features like /leetcode and /sensei for beginner friendly tasks.

Long term, we aim to reduce the time it takes from idea to creation, in order to empower individuals to realize their ideas.

Why does open source matter for a code editor?

The moat is not in the AI models, the best model on the market will be used by any of these editors out there (except Copilot, which actually still uses GPT4 Turbo lol).

This means the true differentiators will be UI/UX, trust, transparency, community support, and distribution. These are all perfectly aligned with open source.

PearAI currently has the most active open source community out of these AI code editors. Unlike most open source projects that are mostly just 1-2 people contributing, PearAI has more than 50% of its commits made by contributors, spanning from our landing page, server and app itself. This explains our extremely fast development cycle. Code editors are the best products to be open source, because each developer are users themselves of the product!

Not only is our code open source, us as founders, are “open source” as well! We post our entire development journey and life online, through our YouTube channel and Twitch livestreams (youtube.com/@FryingPan & youtube.com/@nang88). This is the root of why we have such a strong community right off the start.

Try it out and let me know how you like it! We have a built-in free trial, download for free at https://trypear.ai/download.
one_liner: The open source AI code editor. Code and ship faster than you ever…

name: supercontrast
long_description: Supercontrast makes it easy for anyone to evaluate machine learning models. For example, we could help a small social media app find the best cloud solution for identifying hateful comments and deploy it the same day!
one_liner: Find the best ML model for your use case

name: Regatta Storage
long_description: Regatta Storage allows teams to access their S3 buckets as a local file system, saving 90% on storage costs. With Regatta, engineers can run data analytics directly on S3 -- eliminating data movement for these large data sets. For example, AI companies use Regatta to run their model training directly on data sets stored in S3. Regatta accelerates data access, so your applications experience optimized, local-like performance. Regatta's storage scales with your applications, and you only pay for what you use -- no need to guess how much storage or performance you need. With no complex configuration, you can set up Regatta in a single click.
one_liner: Transform S3 into a high-performance local disk

name: Bramble
long_description:
Bramble is an AI-powered real estate brokerage that provides end-to-end homebuying services for one simple flat fee. Get instant AI help to set up tours, evaluate homes, submit offers, and close confidently - with on-demand support from expert agents when you need it. 

We recently opened early access in CA and in just a few weeks have gotten hundreds of sign-ups, several touring buyers, and have submitted multiple offers across the state - all with near-zero marketing spend. We just offered buyers what they really wanted: a high-quality experience for a reasonable price.
one_liner: AI-powered buy-side brokerage with a simple flat fee
subindustry: Real Estate and Construction -> Housing and Real Estate
